Uses of Interface
org.fluentjdbc.DatabaseSimpleQueryBuilder

  • Packages that use DatabaseSimpleQueryBuilder 
    Package Description
    org.fluentjdbc
    Fluent JDBC is a micro ORM - a library to help you generate and execute SQL statements with JDBC.

    • Uses of DatabaseSimpleQueryBuilder in org.fluentjdbc

      Classes in org.fluentjdbc that implement DatabaseSimpleQueryBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  DatabaseTableQueryBuilder
      Generate SELECT statements by collecting WHERE expressions and parameters.Example:
      Methods in org.fluentjdbc that return DatabaseSimpleQueryBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      DatabaseSimpleQueryBuilder DatabaseTableImpl.query()  
      DatabaseSimpleQueryBuilder DatabaseTableQueryBuilder.query()
      Returns this.
      protected DatabaseSimpleQueryBuilder DatabaseSaveBuilder.tableWhereId​(T p)
      Creates a query where primary key is specified
      protected DatabaseSimpleQueryBuilder DatabaseSaveBuilder.tableWhereUniqueKey()
      Creates a query where all unique fields are specified
      DatabaseSimpleQueryBuilder DatabaseTableQueryBuilder.whereAll​(List<String> fields, List<Object> values)
      For each field adds "WHERE fieldName = value" to the query
      DatabaseSimpleQueryBuilder DatabaseTableQueryBuilder.whereExpression​(String expression)
      Adds the expression to the WHERE-clause
      DatabaseSimpleQueryBuilder DatabaseTableQueryBuilder.whereExpression​(String expression, Object parameter)
      Adds the expression to the WHERE-clause and the value to the parameter list.
      DatabaseSimpleQueryBuilder DatabaseTableQueryBuilder.whereExpressionWithMultipleParameters​(String expression, Collection<?> parameters)
      Adds the expression to the WHERE-clause and all the values to the parameter list.
      DatabaseSimpleQueryBuilder DatabaseTableQueryBuilder.whereIn​(String fieldName, Collection<?> parameters)
      Adds "WHERE fieldName in (?, ?, ?)" to the query.
      DatabaseSimpleQueryBuilder DatabaseTableQueryBuilder.whereOptional​(String fieldName, Object value)
      Adds "WHERE fieldName = value" to the query unless value is null
